name: Primal Rewind
description:
This is an isometric puzzle platform game. 

Humanity has evolved a lot, developing advanced and sophisticated technology. A human named Kevin was chosen to experiment with time travel with a time machine, to make a test of changes in time caused a rupture of space-time, this caused that if Kevin began to walk towards has an involution in a primate named Abraham (of course yes, they had names).

The way to reestablish the space-time continuity is to collect the objects that belong to the time of the characters, making this way they do not arrive to the wrong time, which cause more ruptures.

This is a project developed in 48 hours in a global game jam, our team is formed by:

Luis Fernando González Chávez - Production, programming 

Oscar Alejandro Ríos Ramírez - Game design, level design, programming 

Jair Guadalupe Medina Enciso - Programming 

Yessica Paola Arrez Gamboa - Game design, art, level design 

Juan Pablo Rios Ramirez - Programming 

Emilio Franco Lozano - Level Design, art
